sql.query:
SELECT tt_aeps_tab.id AS table_id, tt_aeps_tab.pay_ref_id, tt_aeps_tab.user_id AS ac_holder_user_id, tt_aeps_tab.old_bal, tt_aeps_tab.amount, tt_aeps_tab.net_amt, tt_aeps_tab.new_bal, tt_aeps_tab.tr_type, tt_aeps_tab.tr_date, tt_aeps_tab.remarks, tt_aeps_tab.status, tt_aeps_tab.created_by AS transaction_by, tt_aeps_tab.crdr_type, tart.user_rt_id, tart.merchant_id, tart.comm_per, tart.comm_val, tart.comm_amt, tart.charge_per, tart.charge_val, tart.charge_amt, tart.tr_mode, tart.tr_type, tart.tr_id, tart.reason, tart.api_logs AS api_name, tart.is_processed, tart.operator_ref, tart.api_ref, tart.ip_address, tart.api_response_time, tart.process_mode, tart.live, tart.trans_by, tart.updated_on, tart.dt_comm_per, tart.dt_comm_val, tart.dt_comm_amt, tart.dt_charge_per, tart.dt_charge_val, tart.dt_charge_amount, tart.mdt_comm_amt, tart.mdt_charge_amt, tart.bank_name, tart.bank_acno, tart.benef_name, tart.benef_id, m_op.operator_name, ms.service_name, mu.user_fname, mu.user_mobile, mu.aeps_merchant_id, mu.created_by AS parent_id, mu_parent.user_fname AS parent_fname, mu_parent.user_mobile AS parent_mobile, tart.aeps_number
FROM tt_aeps_balance AS tt_aeps_tab
INNER JOIN tt_aeps_trans AS tart ON (tart.id = tt_aeps_tab.pay_ref_id) INNER JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tart.op_id) INNER JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = tart.service_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS mu ON (mu.id = tt_aeps_tab.user_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS mu_parent ON (mu_parent.id = mu.created_by)
WHERE tart.tr_date BETWEEN :P1 /* {{$_GET.fromdate}} */ AND :P2 /* {{$_GET.todate}} */
ORDER BY tt_aeps_tab.id DESC

SELECT tt_aeps_tab.id AS table_id, tt_aeps_tab.pay_ref_id, tt_aeps_tab.user_id AS ac_holder_user_id, tt_aeps_tab.old_bal, tt_aeps_tab.amount, tt_aeps_tab.net_amt, tt_aeps_tab.new_bal, tt_aeps_tab.tr_type, tt_aeps_tab.tr_date, tt_aeps_tab.remarks, tt_aeps_tab.status, tt_aeps_tab.created_by AS transaction_by, tt_aeps_tab.crdr_type, tart.user_rt_id, tart.merchant_id, tart.comm_per, tart.comm_val, tart.comm_amt, tart.charge_per, tart.charge_val, tart.charge_amt, tart.tr_mode, tart.tr_type, tart.tr_id, tart.reason, tart.api_logs AS api_name, tart.is_processed, tart.operator_ref, tart.api_ref, tart.ip_address, tart.api_response_time, tart.process_mode, tart.live, tart.trans_by, tart.updated_on, tart.dt_comm_per, tart.dt_comm_val, tart.dt_comm_amt, tart.dt_charge_per, tart.dt_charge_val, tart.dt_charge_amount, tart.mdt_comm_amt, tart.mdt_charge_amt, tart.bank_name, tart.bank_acno, tart.benef_name, tart.benef_id, m_op.operator_name, ms.service_name, mu.user_fname, mu.user_mobile, mu.aeps_merchant_id, mu.created_by AS parent_id, mu_parent.user_fname AS parent_fname, mu_parent.user_mobile AS parent_mobile, tart.aeps_number
FROM tt_aeps_balance AS tt_aeps_tab
INNER JOIN tt_aeps_trans AS tart ON (tart.id = tt_aeps_tab.pay_ref_id) INNER JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tart.op_id) INNER JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = tart.service_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS mu ON (mu.id = tt_aeps_tab.user_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS mu_parent ON (mu_parent.id = mu.created_by)
WHERE tart.tr_date BETWEEN :P1 /* {{$_GET.fromdate}} */ AND :P2 /* {{$_GET.todate}} */ AND tt_aeps_tab.status = :P3 /* {{$_GET.selectstatus}} */
ORDER BY tt_aeps_tab.id DESC
